yelp_reviews.author: P B.
yelp_reviews.review:
Amber was extremely rude and condescending when we met. She was sent as "An appraiser" from Piazza Realty Property Mgmt, and low & behold, she was with another agent with the last name of Piazza! (No appraisal was done, just a lie to get them on the property and in my home. LOL
 She basically told me, we are going to start bringing people through your house whenever we please, even if nobody is home!
I told her I would rather move out than face that type of invasion of my privacy.
She snidely replied (SEVERAL TIMES) You better get busy and move then!
After about the 4th or 5th repetition of this statement, I used my outside voice and told her I heard her the 1st time & invited her to leave my property.
Upon signing the papers at my new residence, I relayed this info to my realtor & when I told him what her name was, he rolled his eyes.. Apparently she has a reputation..
I will never do business with them or recommend them.

The single user review for Soria Real Estate points to an encounter where the staff, specifically an individual named Amber, demonstrated rudeness and a condescending attitude during their meeting. The reviewer felt disrespected and uncomfortable with the nature of the interaction, specifically mentioning feeling as if their privacy was invaded. Furthermore, the reviewer expressed a willingness to move out rather than endure the proposed frequency of property showings.

Ugly

The experience as described by the reviewer also involved deceit, with the staff from Soria Real Estate allegedly falsely presenting themselves as appraisers to gain access to the property. This account of dishonesty raises serious concerns about ethical practices within the company. It's also worth mentioning that the reviewer's recounting of their realtor's reaction suggests that the reputation of the involved staff member from Soria Real Estate might be known in the wider real estate community, which could indicate a pattern of such behavior.
